coreSections.purpose: Set the scene and provide context for the flood event and subsequent analysis
Introduce the dataset, its source, and key characteristics
Briefly explain how the data was categorized and analyzed
Describe observed patterns in flood damage across different structure types
Highlight the most significant findings from the data analysis
Discuss any unexpected or interesting relationships found in the data
Acknowledge constraints of the data and analysis methods
Summarize the main points of the analysis without speculation on broader impacts

dataElements.name: structureType

dataElements.name: location
dataElements.description: Geographic identifiers within the affected area

dataElements.name: timeData
dataElements.description: Relevant dates or time periods related to the flood event

narrativeGuidelines: Tell the story of the flood's impact through data
Use clear, concise language to describe observations
Present data patterns and relationships objectively
Avoid speculation or discussion of broader societal impacts
Use analogies or comparisons to make data more relatable, when appropriate
Maintain a logical flow from general observations to specific insights
visualizationGuidance: Integrate visualizations seamlessly into the narrative
Use visuals to support and enhance textual observations
Ensure all visualizations are clearly explained in the narrative
adaptabilityNotes: Adjust the narrative structure based on the most compelling data stories
Add or modify sections as needed to best present the data insights
Maintain focus on direct observations from the data, avoiding broader extrapolations
